name: Drunk Ninja
description:
⚠️ Game may take it bit to load when clicked play and may lag at first, download below for better performance ⚠️

A drunk ninja hits kids and bombs. you'll probably have at least 2 minutes of fun !! CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

MOUSE - Camera

SHIFT - Sprint

LEFT CLICK - Hit/Attack

SPACE - Jump

R - Ragdoll

E - Pickup things & people

P - Pause/Settings

Game might be laggy on web, if you want to download the game for better performance, you can download below.
